definitions.definition: A heavy fabric , usually made of cotton , with vertical ribs.

A pattern on snow resulting from the use of a snow groomer to pack snow and improve skiing , snowboarding and snowmobile trail conditions. Corduroy is widely regarded as a good surface on which to ski or ride.

main_definition: A heavy fabric , usually made of cotton , with vertical ribs.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , Ireland , slang ) Cheap and poor - quality whiskey .

A pattern on snow resulting from the use of a snow groomer to pack snow and improve skiing , snowboarding and snowmobile trail conditions. Corduroy is widely regarded as a good surface on which to ski or ride.
